title: Coronavirus: WHO chief and Taiwan in row over 'racist' comments
description: Taiwan rejects accusations by the UN health body's head that racist slurs against him originated there.
content:
Image copyrightAFPImage caption
 President Tsai (L) said Taiwan opposed any form of discrimination
A row has erupted after the chief of the World Health Organization (WHO) accused Taiwan's leaders of spearheading personal attacks on him.
